attributes.action: encourage more research into urinary incontinence and break the taboo surrounding this condition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people, particularly women, suffer often in silence, from this embarrassing condition. It is still a taboo subject and sufferers can feel isolated and miserable. It would be good if celebs and other high profile folk admitted to exeriencing urinary incontinence, as some must surely do.
